Title: Frequently Asked Questions
CoinsFAQ: Veil Web Wallet only support RingCT coins, you can't use basecoin(bv) or stealth coins here. To use different types of coins you can use standalone wallet, which you can download here
If you see text "scanning", wallet is not yet scanned, balance will appear a little bit later
Coins transfer isn't immidiate, please wait few minutes before you can see your balance. If you still can't see it, please refer to step 1.
MainFAQ: Under your QR code you can see address, copy button and balances.
First balance mean overall balance, composed of available and pending balance.
<u>Important!</u> This wallet only support sending to any veil address, however, you can't see coins received to basecoin(bv) or stealth addresses.
These are two addresses, first is your primary address, and second left here for compatibility purpose (original wallet send change to separate RingCT address).
3. Why I can't see all my transactions?
At this time wallet show only latest transactions.
You can see another FAQ here.
Also please check out project website veil-project.com
Or official discord: discord.veil-project.com
